Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at 55th/Kenton
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via: 55th, Pulaski, 59th to Midway Orange LIne, due to, street blockage, near 55th/Kenton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 55th, Pulaski, 59th to Midway Orange LIne, due to, street blockage, near 55th/Kenton.

Allow extra travel time.
